channel.title: Bitta help with the npcs shops please!
channel.description: ok i just recently added more shops to my server and they wont work wen i hit trade the shop doesnt open up ive got no errors they just aint workin the wanneshops are summit like 56-61 all other shops before 56 still work and i have added items and amount of them to the shop still nothing added the code for them in client.java ive basically done all the normal stuff im supposed to for a shop they just aint working

have you added in shops.cfg?
and ive got same prob just that i can trade but nothing in there:O but im working on it almost done but gl try add in shops.cfg and get a shop maker or some thing look for a tut
like on multi tut
